1.title: Guitar Hero: Metallica Designer
1.plot: Guitar Hero: Metallica designer Andy Gentile (Neversoft) joins us in the studio to answer questions about the hot new released game. He will also demonstrate the new Expert Plus double pedal feature on the drum kit. As a bonus Rob & Hailey will rock out a track from the new game during the show!

2.title: J.P. Manoux from Aaron Stone
2.plot: J.P. Manoux from Aaron Stone in the studio. Manoux plays Stan the robot on Aaron Stone, an original Disney XD show about a kid who's great at video games. Interviews and coverage from the DSi launch at Citywalk, Los Angeles and coverage from the Madden tournament in Philly with your boy Enyork!

3.title: Chasing SC3
3.plot: Chasing Ghosts director Lincoln Ruchti in studio guest. Chasing Ghosts premiered at Sundance and was praised for its depiction of Arcade World Record Holders from 1982 to the present. Also, Steve Hertz (organizer of SC3, a Southern California arcade/retro collectors group) joins us in the studio. Steve holds arcade/retro parties twice a year and hosts a radio show with video game music. He is one of the largest collectors of Laser Disc games like Dragon's Lair and Space Ace. Tune in with hosts Rob & Hailey as they find out what makes retro gaming tick in modern day.

4.title: Wolverine Game Producer
4.plot: X-Men Origins: Wolverine Producer Chris Palmisano studio guest. Join Rob & Hailey as they find out if this new release from Activision will claw itself to the top! And special bonus - Swoozie (WCG Ultimate Gamer) will be a video skype guest on the show. Also, coverage from the SC3 arcade party and other surprises!

5.title: Shaimus Performance
5.plot: Shaimus live performance in the studio! Shaimus made a name for themselves with songs in both Guitar Hero and Rock Band and are now on tour promoting their newest album 'The Sad Thing Is, We Like It Here'. Shaimus will perform two songs on the show live and field questions from viewers and hosts Rob & Hailey. As a bonus, former IM girl Renee (Summer 2007) will stop by to talk about her new company Rocket Fist.

6.title: GameTrailers.com Producers
6.plot: GameTrailers.com producers Jeremy & Rohan in studio guests. Find out what goes on behind the scenes of one of the most popular Internet websites to carry video game content and produce TV shows for Spike TV. Also, special guest Flitz (Nerdiest-Kids.com) helped MC a trivia contest pitting Jeremy & Rohan head to head in a video game trivia challenge.

7.title: TideGear from Tech-Gaming.com
7.plot: Adam "TideGear" Milecki, one of the writers for Tech-Gaming.com, joins us in the studio! www.Tech-Gaming.com is a popular website on gaming, tech and culture. We'll talk all things E3 Expo and game-related.

8.title: Brian Allgeier from Insomniac
8.plot: Brian Allgeier from Insomniac in the studio! Brian is the Creative Director for Ratchet & Clank Future: A Crack in Time. We are very proud to talk about this popular franchise on the show.

9.title: Rob Pardo from Blizzard
9.plot: Rob Pardo, Executive Vice President of Game Design at Blizzard Entertainment joins us in the studio. Also, making a special appearance in this episode is Rob Workman from AOL Game Daily, Beau Ryan and Leo Camacho from Radnerd.com, and Flitz from nerdiest-kids.com.

10.title: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
10.plot: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger just released this week is getting much buzz behind it and we've got the producer, Mike Manzanares, of the game in the studio as a guest! Join Rob & Hailey this week as they talk about this new 2D fighter from the company that made the hit Guilty Gear. Also an interview with Chris Foster from Harmonix, the Lead Designer for The Beatles: Rock Band!

11.title: King of Fighters XII
11.plot: Shane Bettenhausen joins us in the studio to talk King of Fighters XII. We'll find out why this new 2D fighter from Ignition Entertainment is making waves in the gaming industry.

12.title: Gootecks Talking SFIV
12.plot: Ryan Gutierrez, aka Gootecks, in the studio to talk about the impact and resurgence of the Street Fighter competition and popularity. Gootecks is a skilled player and commentator with a podcast show of his own about the game.

13.title: Parris from Talking About Games
13.plot: Parris Lilly Public Relations Manager for Talking About Games UncleGamer Radio co-host joins Rob & Hailey in the studio to..... talk about games! Parris has been named an MVP in the past before by Microsoft for his contributions in the Xbox community and more!

14.title: Legend of Neil Star Tony Janning
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Rockin Androids
15.plot: Enrique Galvez, CEO for Rockin Android - an import indie gaming company based out of Los Angeles, joins us in the studio to talk about their hot new release SUGARI.

16.title: Pansy Warrior Princess
16.plot: Pansy Warrior Princess joins us in the studio. Pansy is a popular Internet celebrity with viral videos and a regular live show about video games and more.

17.title: SFIV's Marn
17.plot: Martin 'Marn' Phan from New York City's 'Empire Arcadia' joins us in the studio to talk Street Fighter IV and more.

18.title: Uncharted 2 & Operation Flashpoint
18.plot: Jacob Minkoff from Naughty Dog joins us in the studio to talk Uncharted 2: Among Thieves and Mark Turosz from Codemasters talking Operation Flashpoint: Dragon Rising.

19.title: Keith Apicary
19.plot: Video blogger and Internet celebrity Keith Apicary joins us in the studio.

20.title: Voice-Over Actors Tara & Yuri
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: Justin Chon from Twilight
21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

22.title: Ride & God of War
22.plot: Huge show featuring guests from SONY talking God of War 1 & 2 collection for the PS3 and a studio demo of Tony Hawk's Ride game. Join Rob & Hailey for lots of fun and surprises.

23.title: Mr. Dandy
23.plot: Artist and designer James Hakola aka Mr. Dandy studio guest! Join Rob & Hailey for the show with interviews from Nexon talking Dragon Nest and our coverage from DesignerCon 2009.

24.title: Darksiders & Gunnar Optiks
24.plot: Two guests this week on the show - Daniel Iassac from THQ to talk about Darksiders and Joe Croft from Gunnar Optiks.

25.title: The Megas
25.plot: Mega Man celebrates 22 years and The Megas perform live in the studio to help celebrate.

26.title: BusyGamers
26.plot: Amory 'Gritskrieg' Gritta the Editor-In-Chief for BusyGamer.com is the studio guest.

27.title: Nyko
27.plot: Rob Welkner and Hailey Bright as we invite Nyko's Director of Marketing Chris Arbogast on the show.

28.title: Jon Gibson
28.plot: Mr. Gibson founded the I am 8-Bit art show, has produced/curated many other popular video game themed art shows.

29.title: Dragonica Online
29.plot: Chris Lena, producer for THQ*ICE and Dragonica Online team to talk about their Free 2 Play online MMO.

30.title: Lunar: Silver Star Harmony
30.plot: This week we welcome Jessica Chavez from XSEED Games talking Lunar: Silver Star Harmony.

31.title: Justin Wong & Tubefilter
31.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

24.title: Sassy Mohen 'Happy Holidays'
24.plot: Sassy was on COIN-OP TV last March 2007 while shooting her independent feature length film. Now that the movie is finished and making the rounds she wanted to stop by again and give us and update on her progress and activity.

25.title: Counterstrike Pro
25.plot: Professional Gamer Yazan "Clown" Ammari (Counterstrike) in the studio. Special guest IM girl Martine (Guide to Getting a Life) helping while Hailey is out of town and more fun live surprises.

26.title: Beauty & the Beast
26.plot: Rodsmack from the10k.com - Video game news and roundup with Rob, Hailey & Brian. Also a user submitted review of the game Gran Turismo 5 Prologue and more live surprises.

27.title: June Boom
27.plot: Hot news items from Tecmo and Ninja Gaiden 2, Sony's FanFaire and clips from interviews with Fatal1ty and Mark Friedler founder of GameDaily.com

28.title: Metal Gear Solid 4
28.plot: Metal Gear Solid 4 midnight launch interviews with producers Kenichiro Imaizumi (Lead), Ryan Payton (Associate) and voice of Solid Snake David Hayter.

30.title: Kat Hunter
30.plot: Special in-studio guest Kat Hunter, professional gamer and General Manager of San Francisco Team Optx (Championship Gaming Series).

31.title: Toad on Keys
31.plot: The All-American Rejects keyboardist TOAD guests on the show.

32.title: Jude Buffum
32.plot: Jude Buffum, artist participating in the 'i am 8-bit' show, is the in-studio guest. Jude uses his art to parody politics and old school video games.

33.title: Chris Gore
33.plot: Chris Gore - founder of Film Threat magazine, producer My Big Fat Independent Movie and current host on G4tv will be in the studio.

34.title: Chad from Dtoid
34.plot: Chad Concelmo, Associate Editor, Destructoid.com is the studio guest.

35.title: Rob from ManiaTV
35.plot: Rob Talbert host of Arcade on ManiaTV.com will be our in studio guest along with his lovely co-host Kathryn Lyn.

36.title: CraigAttack
36.plot: Craig of ScrewAttack.com stopped by the studio for an impromptu Friday night Coin-Op TV Live.

37.title: E for All Expo
37.plot: Special E FOR ALL EXPO preview with Robert 'The DCD' Workman, Raychul from GameGirl.com and Matt (singer) from LeetStreet Boys in the studio.

38.title: Swoozie All Around
38.plot: Special guest Adande 'Swoozie' Thorne (host for The Championship Gaming Series and World Cyber Games) in the studio.

39.title: Gaming Angels
39.plot: GamingAngels.com is an online community for women who love to talk about all things geek.

40.title: EBay for Video Games?
40.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

41.title: Halloween Fun
41.plot: Rina-Chan (famous cosplayer and voice actress) in the studio to celebrate our special Halloween episode! Video skype with Robert 'The DCD' Workman with his latest game reviews.

42.title: Shaimus the Band
42.plot: Shaimus in the studio! Their music has appeared on both Guitar Hero and Rock Band. Rob & Hailey find out what makes this awesome band tick and their experience being in the two most popular rhythm game franchises.

43.title: Alex Albrecht
43.plot: Alex Albrecht will be our special guest in the studio. Alex has made a name for himself on TV and the Internet with Diggnation and The Totally Rad Show. Also - a review of Spider-Man: Web of Shadows. Join Rob & Hailey for some video gaming excitement and other surprises!

44.title: Sadie's Gaming Infection
44.plot: Sadie UltraNeko studio guest this week. She is an indie game reviewer with fun videos and spoofs on the net. Rob & Hailey bring you the video gaming fun. Also - a review of FRAG the documentary and more surprises.

45.title: ASTRO Gaming
45.plot: Josh 'Stormy' LaTendresse from ASTRO Gaming in the studio. ASTRO is the design firm behind the Xbox 360, Alienware PC's and the new HP Blackbird. ASTRO's headsets are the official gear for the Major League Gaming pro circuit. All their product specs are made to meet 'tournament grade.' Video game reviews and other fun excitement from hosts Rob Welkner and Hailey Bright!

46.title: Social Networking
46.plot: Bill Ganz, author of Belonging Networks - a Social Networking Reference Guide, guest in the studio. Viewer submitted reviews and more. Hosts Robert Welkner and Hailey Bright bringing you the latest news and excitement around the world of video games!

47.title: Choose Your Own Adventure
47.plot: Chad, Matt and Rob from The Time Machine in the studio! This popular youtube show allows viewers to 'Choose Your Own Adventure' with an open ended episodic video experience. With a wrap-up of the hottest video game titles of 2008.

48.title: Sworn of Neversoft
48.plot: Hosts Robert Welkner and Hailey Bright welcome everyone into the new year with special studio guest David 'Sworn' Stowater - Guitar Hero Designer at Neversoft Entertainment. Sworn composed the song "Electro Rock" for Guitar Hero World Tour which is featured as free DLC in the Neversoft Track Pack for X360, PS3 and Wii. Also a recap of the holiday action and a look at what's ahead in 2009.

49.title: CES & Black Nerd Comedy
49.plot: Black Nerd Comedy (Andre Meadows) comes by the studio to showcase his new music video spoof titled 'Konami Code' with a cameo from Rob Welkner. Also, Hailey Bright returns from the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) with plenty of pictures and gadget stories to share.

50.title: Ken Lally from Heroes & RE5
50.plot: Ken Lally (Heroes & Resident Evil 5) guest in the studio! Ken played 'The German' on the hit show HEROES and is also the motion capture artist for the upcoming Capcom game Resident Evil 5 where he plays a villain in the game Albert Wesker. Join hosts Robert Welkner and Hailey Bright as they welcome Ken to the studio and bring you the latest in video game industry news.

51.title: Zaboo'd
51.plot: Sandeep Parikh (Zaboo from The Guild) in the studio! The Guild is a widely popular Internet comedy web series. Sandeep is also the creative force behind the recent show The Legend of Neil. Join Rob & Hailey as they catch up on gaming events and interview Sandeep.

52.title: The Rob & Hailey Show
52.plot: Find out what Rob & Hailey do when not hosting the show on Thursday nights. Ice skating, party at our competitors and schmooze with video gaming industry folks. Also a special video skype with Robert 'The DCD' Workman and video review of Boogerman.

53.title: Mark Soderwall Game Consultant
53.plot: Mark Soderwall Game Art & Design Consultant is the guest in the studio. Mark has an extensive background in the video game industry and has helped companies find solutions to the creative side of making video games. Also the elements go into making a successful video game from the ground up.

54.title: Marisa Petroro Deal or No Deal model
54.plot: Deal or No Deal girl Marisa Petroro is the guest star in the studio. She is in eighteenth position on the show, and will be delving into her past and present acting career and more.

55.title: Artist Scott C. (Brutal Legend)
55.plot: Artist Scott C. has done concept art for video games like Psychonauts and Brutal Legend. Many gamers may know him from The King of Kong DVD alternate cover and I am 8-bit art shows. Scott will be in town for his solo show 'Homeslice' at Gallery Nucleus. Rob & Hailey talk video game news, art and all things fun!

56.title: Lucas Allmon (WebCardz.com)
56.plot: Lucas Allmon, community manager, WebCardz.com joins Rob & Hailey in the studio to talk about their popular card game series. Also video game news and event talk from your favorite team!

57.title: Flitz from Nerdiest-Kids
57.plot: Flitz, founder of Nerdiest-Kids.com, your eclectic source for all things profoundly nerdtastic is the studio guest. Born from G4, this group has a pulse on what's hip and cool. The founder will join us in the studio to talk shop. Rob & Hailey will also catch you up to speed on the gaming world and activities. Also - a viewer submitted review of Street Fighter Alpha 3.

imdb.title: Coin-Op TV Live
plot: Show about the video game industry, people and events. A weekly live and interactive hardcore show about casual gaming.::Robert Welkner
